rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall leading to a living area.
Central living area with adjoining dining space and garden access.
Adjacent to the kitchen; ideal for family meals and gatherings.
Efficiently designed kitchen with modern appliances and ample storage.
First guest room, Vastu optimized for north or east direction.
Small storage area integrated into the entrance hall.
Guest bathroom ensuring Vastu compliance by positioning in the northeast corner of ground floor.

additional_elements.description: Large garden area occupying a significant portion of the rear section, with pathways and seating.
Integrated in the basement or adjoining living room for multimedia experience, ensuring sound insulation.

notes: The design leverages colonial aesthetics with modern functionality.
Efficient space utilization and cost-effective materials align with a tight budget.
Vastu principles: kitchen and storage in southeast, main entrance in north; living area in center.
Plan incorporates natural lighting and ventilation.
